short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trái Cây (Fruit): By Khôi Bảo Phạm

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This piece highlights some of the artist's favorite tropical fruits commonly found in Asia: persimmons, dragon fruit, mangosteen, and starfruit.

Khôi Phạm is a Saigon-born, Brooklyn based artist. His works investigate and distort the quiet vibration within the mundane. Drawing inspiration from the everyday object , Khôi amplifies these items, expanding their meaning and presence past the obvious.
